values.value:
• I am an Australian Tax Resident.
  • I have read and understood the Salary Sacrifice Policy and agree to abide by the provisions which may be varied from time to time.
  • I understand that Purchased Leave must be consumed in the same financial year that it is bought.
  • I have read and understood the Purchase Additional Leave Policy
  • I understand that I will have my salary/wages proportionally deducted using a salary sacrifice scheme calculated on the current salary/wages based on the number of weeks I purchase.
  • I understand that salary sacrifice deductions will commence the fortnight after the application is received with the last deduction concluding by 30th May of this financial year.
  • I understand that my purchased leave will be paid to me based on the value deducted upon submission of the application.
